name: Vanish (ZeroDigitZ)
description:
Story

This game is a psychological mystery/horror game where three strangers are kidnapped and forced to compete in a deadly game called “Vanish”. Vanish is a three part mini series that will have plot twists, puzzles, minigames, and multiple endings.

The rules of this game are not in your favor so remember to save often.

Vanish is inspired by Saw and Gantz.

Escape minigame is included in Chapter 1

Controls

Accept: Z / Enter / Left-Click

Cancel/Menu: X / Esc

Movement / Menu Selection: Arrow Keys or Mouse.

Soundtrack

Safe Room

Breaking Point

Main Theme

Marvelous

The Curse
